item.title: Projects
item.description: Course notes under construction Reading I have a list of topics I want to learn (not shown here). Talk to me if you want to recommend a book, share ideas, or read something together. Currently: Étale cohomology, mainly following Freitag & Kiehl. Representation theory of Lie groups, mainly following Bröcker & tom Dieck and Fulton & Harris.

item.title: About
item.description: Ma vie est monotone. Je chasse les poules, les hommes me chassent. Toutes les poules se ressemblent, et tous les hommes se ressemblent. Je m’ennuie donc un peu. The fox from The Little Prince (…)

item.title: Résumé
item.description: Education Massachusetts Institute of Technology (2022 – ongoing) Princeton Int’l School of Math and Science (2018 – 2022) Research Analytic Langlands correspondence for PGL(2) in genus 0 with wild ramification. (Summer 2023 – ongoing) Part of SPUR. Mentor: Daniil Klyuev. Awards Gold medal, International Mathematical Olympiad (2021)
